oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We prove a Chernoff-like large deviation bound on the sum of non-independent random variables that have the following dependence structure. The variables Y1,...,Yr are arbitrary [0,1]-valued functions of independent random variables X1,...,Xm, modulo a restriction that every X-i influences at most k of the variables Y1,...,Yr.
